title: Auth
items: Restore password in case user forgot it
Login with saved session (thanks to firebase observer)

title: Profile
items: change your information like avatar, status, name and visibility (if another users can see you)

title: Groups
items: Create groups that have name, image, settings
The creator of the group has access to an admin panel where he can update group changes like name, image or allowing their members to invite other users
Todo list associated with it. The members are able to create tasks, toggle tasks from done to undone and viceversa, and delete done tasks
The creator of the group may delete the group if he wants

title: News
items: There is a news section where user can read the last app-related news
